downloadTitle: Using Visio Premium 2010 for diagram validation
downloadDescription: Learn how to automatically check your diagrams for issues using the diagram validation feature in Visio Premium 2010.
detailsSection: Learn how you can automatically verify diagrams in Microsoft Visio Premium 2010. This white paper introduces the diagram validation feature, which enables you to check diagrams for common errors and against required diagramming standards. Visio Premium 2010 includes out-of-the-box functionality for validating basic flowchart, cross-functional flowchart, Six Sigma, Microsoft SharePoint workflow, and Business Process Modeling Notation (BPMN) diagrams.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to view and save the document to your computer.
